issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

comments.body:
I installed Hive2.0.0 and complied Tez0.8.2 for it
then i just query like this:
select count(1) from originallogs
then i can see logs  like this:
2016-02-29T13:50:44,893 INFO  [fddeb46e-5c76-4f5f-91a5-e197e28d261f fddeb46e-5c76-4f5f-91a5-e197e28d261f main]: ql.Context (Context.java:getMRScratchDir(331)) - New scratch dir is hdfs://cluster1/tmp/hive/hive/fddeb46e-5c76-4f5f-91a5-e197e28d261f/hive_2016-02-29_13-50-44_195_3484063917017188980-1
